title: Whalegirl
author: Whalegirl
content: I would like to introduce you to Potfolio.Potfolio works similar to an ETF, but for cryptocurrencies. In their portfolio there are only the biggest assets (Bitcoin, Ethereum, and so on). Everything can be seen transparently in the network.They've just launched and are already starting with an insane investment pot of $150,000.So you have the opportunity to invest directly diversified with leverage, instead of doing it yourself.The team is legitimate and has already done nothing questionable or the like in previous projects.Telegram: https://t.me/Potfolio_OfficialWebsite: https://potfol.io/

comments.author: julerz12
comments.body: Quote from: Whalegirl on January 18, 2023, 09:26:45 PMThe team is legitimate and has already done nothing questionable or the like in previous projects.Which team? There is literally no one representing this project on their website or on their social media channels.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: If I may add that question about team above, your project also detected to have plagiarized document. I cordially invite you to defend yourself on the accusation thread I raised against you herePlagiarism Detected

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: Whalegirl on January 18, 2023, 09:26:45 PMThe team is legitimate and has already done nothing questionable or the like in previous projects.Your lack of transparency raises questions about the legitimacy of your team and the authenticity of your project, which appears to contain plagiarized content, as pointed out by @holydarkness. Explain yourself now and provide evidence to support your claims. There is no team listed on the website. Are you part of the team?

comments.author: Whalegirl
comments.body: Hello to all.We all projects in Shitcoin space we are almost exclusively in Telegram. I invite you to contact us there if you have any questions or uncertainties.I made a statement in the other thread about the accusations.In short: We are the same team, we make that transparent.Golddoge Sachs and Potfolio are the same project and the same token. We had to rebrand due to a legal dispute.Many greetingsThe team of Potfolio
